title: Any way to message players on the boards?
body:
I got a reply to one of my posts on the forums that was misinterpreted. Wanted to clarify what I was saying, but the thread apparently was removed or deleted, so now I can't. Is there a way to message people after the fact?

The misunderstanding was: I told someone to "take a bucket of salt with them" when listening to advice from strangers, referencing the old phrase "take this advice with a grain of salt". Apparently... they thought I was accusing them of being salty... uh, nooooot the kind of "salt" I was referring to AT ALL, and definitely not the kind of misunderstanding I'd want to leave up in the air.
